title: How to Make Swirled Cheesecake Brownies

steps.headline: Mix together whole wheat flour, cocoa and salt in a bowl.
steps.description: In seperate bowl, beat eggs, egg whites, and brown sugar with an electric mixer on medium speed until smooth. Add oil and either coffee or tea, and vanilla for flavoring.

steps.headline: Melt the chocolate and butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat.
Remove pan from heat.
steps.description: Beat eggs and add them one at a time. Add flour and stir well, then add chopped nuts.

steps.headline: Put the batter into a brownie pan.
steps.description: Level it with the back of a spoon.

steps.headline: Beat cream cheese until soft in small bowl..
Add sugar, cocoa powder and vanilla.
Add flour and beat well.
steps.description: Then put in the eggs --- one at a time --- and beat well.

steps.headline: Adjust rack to bottom 1/3 of oven.
Line a 9 x 9-inch pan (23 cm) with a square of aluminum foil.
Grease the pan with 1 tablespoon of butter.
Pour cheesecake batter over brownie layer and smooth the top.
Marbleize the batter.
steps.description: Insert a knife almost to the bottom of one corner and cut through the batter in an S pattern.

steps.headline: Bake for 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Remove brownies from the pan.
steps.description: Cover top of pan with a sheet of wax paper, then a cookie sheet. Invert onto cookie sheet and peel away foil that was underneath. Invert again right side up. The cheesecake layer will now be on top.

steps.headline: Cut into 32 bars or triangles, cleaning blade after each cut.

text: Making the Brownie Layer Mix together whole wheat flour, cocoa and salt in a bowl. In seperate bowl, beat eggs, egg whites, and brown sugar with an electric mixer on medium speed until smooth. Add oil and either coffee or tea, and vanilla for flavoring. Melt the chocolate and butter in a heavy saucepan over medium heat.  Whisk in sugar and vanilla.  Remove pan from heat. Beat eggs and add them one at a time. Add flour and stir well, then add chopped nuts. Put the batter into a brownie pan. Level it with the back of a spoon. Making the Chocolate Cheesecake Layer Beat cream cheese until soft in small bowl..  Add sugar, cocoa powder and vanilla.  Add flour and beat well. Then put in the eggs --- one at a time --- and beat well. Baking and Serving Preheat your oven to 350ºF or 180ºC.  Adjust rack to bottom 1/3 of oven.  Line a 9 x 9-inch pan (23 cm) with a square of aluminum foil.  Grease the pan with 1 tablespoon of butter.  Pour cheesecake batter over brownie layer and smooth the top.  Marbleize the batter. Insert a knife almost to the bottom of one corner and cut through the batter in an S pattern. Bake for 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean.  Chill until firm.  Remove brownies from the pan. Cover top of pan with a sheet of wax paper, then a cookie sheet. Invert onto cookie sheet and peel away foil that was underneath. Invert again right side up. The cheesecake layer will now be on top. Cut into 32 bars or triangles, cleaning blade after each cut.  Serve cold.
